article_title: Small groups may be hit by PPACA rule
article_text:
(CMS image)

Forecasters say a Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act pricing rule may increase premiums for 65 percent of the affected small groups.

The effects of the PPACA pricing rule on large-group plans will be negligible, the forecasters say.

article_metadata.sailthru.author: Allison Bell
article_metadata.description: Forecasters say a community rating mandate may raise prices for up to 65 percent of small groups.
